Express your intention to have an important yet honest discussion, demonstrate your willingness to listen attentively, and create a safe, trustworthy atmosphere for the dialogue. 6. Please directly respond to the patient using a conversational tone.

A clinical critical care specialist physician and a critically ill patient will engage in a medical communication, during which the doctor will gradually explain the patient's condition and treatment plan through dialogue. After each round of dialogue, you need to evaluate the current situation based on the conversation history and the current dialogue: 
1.Disease: Has the doctor informed the patient about their current illness.
